Trying to impose their way of life on everyone, Bapp. Can you perhaps see why we fear your type?

Not really consdering the fact that your type are the ones trying to make everyone partakers of your lascivious ways of life . Asking us to pay tribute to your neo pagan heathen baby killing god Molech thru our taxes .

This is yr 2009. These Barbarians killing in the name of Allah are nothing but cowards. If they get this educations they are so afraid of, Their life will be a lot better and they will stop going around like the cave men that they are.Animals in human skin.
I guess it's now OK in your book. I guess we should no longer discuss any latest murdering of people in the name of Allah since it's nothing new.

But wait a minute. Is it a new thing for a Christian leader to commit adultery or practise homosexuality? Is it a new thing for a Christian to commit murder supposedly in the name of Christ? Is it a new thing for Bruce and Brian to poke each other and call it sex?...
Those aren't new! And yet you are on record on this forum for having discussed every single one of them ad nauseam!

Like all other pseudo-intellectuals, you reject the truth and embrace a lie and then describe your behavior as <i>progress and enlightenment.<i> At the same time, you demand that we smart people shut up and just accept your lie as the truth as you take us to the cliff of your ignorance.

If the story on this thread had been about some Christians who doused the homes of their Islamist neighbors with kerosine before setting them on fire, you would have been the first fool here to accuse Christians and assail Christianity for being nothing more than another violent religion!
But since the story is about the religion of piss, you "ll rather demand that we drop its discussion like a hot potato in the hand of feckless Obama! You hypocrite!!!!!!!!

Just when are we going to stop blaming only our so-called leaders for every woe that befalls us? Don't we, the citizens, have any responsibilities?

I would even go as far as re-defining what most people would call leaders to include ANYONE/EVERYONE in a position of influence, and that could be anybody. These so-called leaders are negligent in the sense that they fail to enforce the rules/laws. Enforcing the rules/laws will "set straighjt" those who have suspended their faculity and then shift their responsibilities onto someone else, which is what I see everywhere I go here.
You see, I read this long time ago on the seal of the University of Florida, that, "The welfare of a state depends on the morality of its citizens." I believe it!
You want Nigeria to be great? Then EVERONE MUST PICTH IN! Merely desiring a change is not enough, one must be willing to change as well.
Only an idiot would dismiss hundreds of lives slaughtered senselessly under any circumstances as "nothing new"
Only a moron will realize that just because the word 'taliban' is slapped on a problem does not make it any different from all the killings that have been occuring in the name of Islam in the North.
It's like this thing happens in Northern Nigeria every 6 months or so.
